org.sidoh.wwf_api
Class AccessTokenRetriever

java.lang.Object
  org.sidoh.wwf_api.AccessTokenRetriever

public class AccessTokenRetriever
extends java.lang.Object

Convenience class for logging into Facebook and retrieving the oauth token that WWF uses to authenticate with Facebook. This is the only session paramater necessary to interact with the WWF API.

Method Detail

getAccessToken

public java.lang.String getAccessToken(java.lang.String username,
                                       java.lang.String password)
                                throws java.io.IOException
Retrieves the access token for a Facebook user having the provided username and password. This only works for users who have already authorized the WWF app within Facebook.

Parameters:
username -
password -
Returns:
access token for the user. if user hasn't authorized WWF, this will return null.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

login

protected boolean login(org.sidoh.wwf_api.AccessTokenRetriever.Context callContext)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Login to Facebook by finding the login form on the front page, filling it out, and submitting it.

Parameters:
callContext -
Returns:
true if login was successful
Throws:
java.io.IOException
